nodes.documentation:
Underscore Protocol Ethereum Service used to store the content of
_Prtcl perspectives
nodes.name: Uprtcl

nodes.documentation:
Adds a new perspective to the mapping and sets the owner. The head pointer is initialized as null and should
 be updated independently using updateHead(). The contextHash is not persisted but emited in the PerspectiveAdded
 event to enable filtering. Validation of the perspectiveId to contextHash should be done externally using any
	content addressable	storage solution for the perspectiveId. The perspectiveId is emited to help perspectiveHash
 reverse mapping
nodes.name: addPerspective

nodes.documentation:
internal function that updates the head pointer of a given perspective. It dont
check the owner to let the request functionality do it. Its internal
so user should use updateHeads instead.
nodes.name: updateHead

nodes.documentation: Changes the owner of a given perspective. Available only to the current owner of that perspective.
nodes.name: changeOwner

nodes.documentation: Get the perspective owner and head from its ID
nodes.name: getPerspective

nodes.documentation:
One method to execute the head updates directly, without creating the request. Useful
if the owner dont want to use the request authorization feature.
It also works for updating one single perspective
nodes.name: updateHeads

nodes.documentation:
Creates a new request owned and initialize its properties.
The id of the request is derived from the message sender to prevent frontrunning attacks.
nodes.name: initRequest

 be updated independently using updateHead(). The contextHash is not persisted but emited in the PerspectiveAdded

addPerspective(bytes32,bytes32,string,ad.notice: Adds a new perspective to the mapping and sets the owner. The head pointer is initialized as null and should be updated independently using updateHead(). The contextHash is not persisted but emited in the PerspectiveAdded event to enable filtering. Validation of the perspectiveId to contextHash should be done externally using any	content addressable	storage solution for the perspectiveId. The perspectiveId is emited to help perspectiveHash reverse mapping
